alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 2:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bay, central Walton and southwestern Washington Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 142 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of De Funiak Springs to near Eglin Air Force Base. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eglin Air Force Base, Live Oak, Freeport, Ebro, Hinsons Crossroads, Red Bay, Portland, Villa Tasso, Greenhead, Rock Hill, Bruce, Red Head, Eucheeanna, Holmes Valley, Millers Ferry, Pine Log, New Home, Knox Hill and Riverside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
